title: Using Shadow Energy Again (Part 1)
body:
Using Shadow Energy Again (Part 1)

"Fu*k Off," Evan said to Carlos after hearing he wanted to kill him.

Valery who was trying to stand up after blowing away by the Shockwaves was stunned and looked at Evan with a dumbfounded look.

Even Carlos who was looking at Evan with a murderous gaze was taken aback.

He thought after hearing he is going to kill him, Evan will show fear and will beg for mercy.

But here instead of showing fear he is cursing him.

Carlos felt after the transformation his ears is not working properly, but when he saw Evan was still showing his middle finger he discarded this possibility.

A green aura burst froth from Carlos's body, and the atmosphere around him become heavy.

His eyes become cold, and he locked down his aura on Evan.

Evan felt a heavy pressure around him, and it became a little difficult for him to breathe. He tried to move his body but found it very difficult for him to even move his body.
